com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class MovieDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.MovieDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovieDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class MovieDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MovieDao
    The class MovieDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the Movies table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the MovieDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly

      The Constant ONE_AFFECTED_OR_MATCHED_ROW is used to check if there is 1 affected or matched row.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Movie> releasedMoviesMap
      The movies map which contains the movie Id and the Movie object.

      • releasedMoviesMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Movie> releasedMoviesMap
        The movies map which contains the movie Id and the Movie object. This Map will be used to find movie by Id. The map will be created from getListOfReleasedMovies while storing each of the movie object.

      • ONE_AFFECTED_OR_MATCHED_ROW

        private static final int ONE_AFFECTED_OR_MATCHED_ROW
        The Constant ONE_AFFECTED_OR_MATCHED_ROW is used to check if there is 1 affected or matched row.
